duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and optimize code for embedded systems to enable communication between software components.
Support the development of systems, sites, and tools using the latest technology and tools.
Work with cybersecurity specialists to ensure software security and troubleshoot operational issues.
Configure and develop solutions for a wide range of devices based on platforms being used.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or Software Engineering
